title: My Friendlist is blank
body: Logged on today after update and my friendlist was completely blank. reinstalled twice (over 15GB) and still nothing. Am i the only one experiencing this?

replies.body:
Possible workaround for the empty friends list bug (for Win 10):

1. Press "Start"
2. Search "Date and Time"
3. Select "Date and Time Settings"
4. Activate "Set time automatically" and "Set time zone automatically"
5. Press "Sync now" under "Synchronise your clock"
6. Reload your client
Same no solutions since 2 week now ,"RIOT"
me too, friend list gone, nothing here.
me too. is there any solution for us ?
